actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary Jubilee Act.

summary.text: Amends the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary Jubilee Act to authorize the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary Jubilee Commission to expend a specified amount of authorized funds to entertain foreign representatives. Removes caps on donations the Commission may accept. Authorizes the Commission to permit commercial use of the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary Jubilee logo.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary Jubilee Act.
